title: mammu brOcu
sahitya:
mammu brOcu paTla nIkinta manasu rAvadEmi sAmi


anupallavi

  I mahini velayu shrI shESagiri Isha suprakAshA vEnkaTEshA


caraNam 1    nija bhaktitODa nI padayugamula niratamu pUjinci dhyAnincu 
sujanula jEri nI guNa kadalanu sommu mIra gAnu pATu cunna
    caraNam 2    ibha rakSaka I kali mAnavula kiSTa kAmita phalamu losangEDu 
shubha dAyakuDani vini nI sannidhi jocci cAla vandana monarincina
    caraNam 3    nIla mEgha nibhAdEha shrIyalamElu manga hrd-pankaja kIra 
bAla vENugOpAladAsa paripAla karuNAla vAla shrI lOlA
